overview:
Daniel is an entrepreneur & an innovation consultant.

He founded in 2007 ExploLab, an innovation & strategy consulting practice working for leading companies in France, with JÃ©rÃ´me Serre, and eduPad in 2010. eduPad is a cross-platform solution that enables people and organizations to publish e-learning apps for free.

Daniel is an engineer. He started his career at Weborama, and then he build the CNPLab, an insurance internal incubator which has been acknowledge by Forrester Research in 2006 as one of the most performant Innovation Management Process. He launches with JÃ©rÃ´me Serre MobiVote and then RetrouvezNous, ExploLab, AmiDesk, GangTrading, iTooch, eduPadâ€¦

Daniel helps entrepreneurs through a private incubator, ExploLab Factory, that invests in projects at the idea stage. ExploLab Factory is inspired by Y-combinator.
